title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
### Experience Pure Comfort with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier 1 Gallon, Black

#### Keep the Air Moist and Refreshing

Discover the perfect blend of modern convenience and comfort with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, black. Designed to keep your home’s air moist and refreshing, this humidifier is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance indoor comfort during dry seasons.

#### Features That Make a Difference

- **1 Gallon Tank Capacity:** Enjoy a generous 1 gallon of water to keep your humidifier running for longer, ensuring continuous moisture without frequent refills.
- **Black Finish:** Sleek and stylish, this humidifier fits seamlessly into any room, adding an elegant touch to your decor.
- **Cool Mist Evaporative Technology:** Experience the soothing benefits of cool mist with our evaporative technology, perfect for maintaining a comfortable and healthy indoor environment.
- **3 Speed Settings:** Choose from 3 adjustable speeds to suit your personal preferences and needs, from a gentle whisper to a more robust mist.
- **Mechanical Knob Control:** Easily adjust the mist output with a simple mechanical knob, providing a user-friendly and intuitive experience.
- **320 Sq. Ft. Coverage Area:** Perfect for medium to large rooms, ensuring that the humidifier’s benefits are felt throughout your space.
- **Aroma Tray:** Enhance your experience with the included aroma tray, allowing you to enjoy essential oils or scented waters and add a calming fragrance to your surroundings.
- **Low Tank Indicator:** Stay on top of your humidifier’s status with a clear low tank indicator, ensuring you never run out of water.
- **Dishwasher Safe:** Keep your humidifier clean and hygienic with the easy-to-clean parts, including the removable tank and aroma tray, which are dishwasher safe.
- **Replacement Filter Compatibility:** Easily replace the BestAir H62 filter when needed, ensuring optimal performance and longevity.
- **Empty Tank Protection:** Rest easy knowing your humidifier will automatically turn off if the tank is empty, preventing any potential damage.
- **Evaporative Technology:** Enjoy the benefits of evaporative technology which is known for its energy efficiency and quiet operation.

#### Perfect for Any Home

Whether you need to soothe dry skin, relieve congestion, or simply enjoy a more comfortable and pleasant atmosphere, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is the perfect addition to your home. Its compact size and modern design make it a versatile and attractive option for any room.

**Upgrade Your Living Space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier Today!**
